trackConversion

public static void trackConversion(Context context,
                                   String goalId,
                                   MMRequest request)
Reports a goal conversion to the Millennial Conversion tracking server.

Parameters:
context - Any Android Context object.
goalId - The Millennial Media Goal ID for tracking conversions for your application.
requestData - An MMRequest object with location, demographic, and/or contextual information.

trackEvent

public static void trackEvent(Context context,
                              String eventId)
Reports an event conversion. Specialty feature. An event ID will be provided to you by your Millennial Media Account Manager.

Parameters:
context - Any Android Context object.
eventId - The Millennial Media event ID for tracking events in your application.
